alert.note: Alert for Southwest Carbon County; Upper North Platte River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 03 at 7:05PM MDT until April 04 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Southwest Carbon County and Upper North Platte River Basin including Baggs and Saratoga. * WHEN...From Now to 6 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be impacted. Blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Southwest Carbon County; Upper North Platte River Basin
